name: Run, Arnoldo!
description:
Meet Arnoldo, a young boy who's always running.

Through seven stages you have to run to find out Arnoldo's reason. With enemies on his way, puppies who are not that supportive, and more, Run, Arnoldo! is a game to revisit the simple times of fun and play with a simple mechanic, and challenging levels.

Thanks a lot to all GB Studio community for this incredible tool, and all the assets shared!

This is the very first release of Obaasan Games, and we want to bring back the 90's!

Command list:

  • arrows, w/a/s/d: move
  • alt, z, j: run faster, interact with NPCs
  • control, k, x: jump 

If you download the rom, you can play the game in your favorite emulator! Pick the one you like the most, and have fun!
